meanings.sent1: The dorps in the countryside have friendly people.
meanings.sent2: We visited several dorps during our road trip.
meanings.sent3: The dorp at the foot of the mountain had only one street.
meanings.sent4: In the painting, the artist captured the essence of a dorp under the starry sky.
meanings.sent5: The sound of church bells echoed through the dorp, creating a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: Many dorps can be found across the region.
meanings.sent2: The map displayed all the dorps in the area.
meanings.sent3: The dorps gathered for their annual harvest festival.
meanings.sent4: She dreamt of exploring the mysterious dorps in the valley.
meanings.sent5: The guidebook listed the histories of various dorps in the province.
